title: Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. Sarah L Tarter, MD - Akron, OH - Internal Medicine
cleaned_text: Sarah L Tarter, MD Internal Medicine Locations Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine About Sarah L Tarter Dr. Sarah Tarter was raised in both England and northeast Ohio and is a graduate of Stow Munroe Falls High School. As a board-certified physician in internal medicine, she has a special interest in preventive care. Dr. Tarter spends time as a teaching attending with the residents and medical students at Summa Akron City Hospital, and she also volunteers in a local faith-based free medical clinic. Dr. Tarter enjoys exploring the local Metroparks with her husband, reading and spending time with family and friends. Expertise Education Northeastern Ohio Universities College of Medicine Medical School, 2009 Summa Health System Residency, Internal Medicine, 2012 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health. These patient survey scores are noted here and updated on a monthly basis. Insurance Note: This is not an all-inclusive list of health plans. Additional health plans may be accepted. Please contact your insurance provider for confirmation. - Buckeye (Ambetter Product) - Buckeye Advantage (Medicare Product) - Buckeye Medicaid - ChoiceCare - Cofinity - Direct Care America - Emerald Health Network - First Health Network - Fortified Provider Network
